item.title: Netflix Cancels ‘The Waterfront’ After One Season
item.description: The Kevin Williamson-created crime drama starred Holt McCallany, Maria Bello, Melissa Benoist and Topher Grace.

item.title: ‘The Waterfront’ Canceled at Netflix After One Season
item.description: “The Waterfront” has gone overboard at Netflix. The streamer has canceled the crime series, Variety has confirmed. The decision comes just over two months after its first season debuted. C
